summary: Documentary on Charles Manson and his family. Has a number of insightful interviews with many family members most notably Squeaky and Sandy (Blue and Red). There is also a history of Manson... See full summary Â»
cast: Mary Brunner|Vincent Bugliosi|Bruce Davis|Lynette Fromme|Sandra Good|Steve Grogan|Ronnie Howard|Charles Manson|Jesse Pearson|Phil Phillips|Nancy Pitman|Brooks Poston|Catherine Share|George Spahn|Paul Watkins
title: Manson
